overview: Nathan doesn't seem to fit in anywhere. He's just not meant to be a queer boy, so what is he to do? To bro, or not to bro? That is the question. Follow Nathan as he flips the script and plays it straight. Where will he end up? And with who? His life has no direction, and every move he makes is slowly turning into a series of tragic decisions. It won't be too long before someone is going to get hurt.
title: Straight Faced
